scripts.dev: concurrently '(cd server && npm run transpile:watch)' '(cd server && npm run dev)' '(cd client && npm run dev)' '(cd client && npm run generateTypes:watch)'
scripts.build: concurrently '(cd server && npm run build)' '(cd client && npm run generateTypes && npm run build)'
scripts.start: concurrently '(cd server && npm run start)' '(cd client && npm run preview)'
scripts.postinstall: concurrently '(cd server && npm install)' '(cd client && npm install)'
